messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] tantrums
messages.msgSnippet: Pat,  your spitting four year old story made me chuckle.....because when I was 3,  new nieghbors moved into the next door house.  As I watched them carting
messages.messageBody:
Pat, your spitting four year old story made me chuckle.....because when I
was 3, new nieghbors moved into the next door house. As I watched them
carting stuff up the riveway, thay gave me a friendly 'hello, little girl."
Well, I spit at them.
Personally, I don't remember this, but since they still live there,
they remind me of it EVERY time I go visit -LOL-(they and my parents still
live there.) We all laugh about this ...they claim to have shrugged it off
and joked with my parents about it. Anyway, people who know me now...and
most of my older childhood on, would have a hard time imagining me being so
incorrigible!
Susan
